abstract: Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei makes rare effort to reach out to American and European youth; sends published letter and Twitter posts asking young Westerners to research Islam themselves rather than relying on media sources for an understanding of one of world's oldest religions and cultures.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s supreme leader released a letter and posted on Twitter after the attacks in Paris by militants who said they acted in the name of Islam.
snippet: Iran’s supreme leader released a letter and posted on Twitter after the attacks in Paris by militants who said they acted in the name of Islam.

headline.main: Ayatollah Khamenei Appeals to Western Youth on Islam and Prejudice
headline.print_headline: Iranian Ayatollah Beseeches Western Youth on Islam
